shows.title: UFOs & MH370 / JFK Assassination
shows.first_half: In the first half, investigator Ashton Forbes joins guest host Rich Berra (email) to discuss his work delving into UFOs and the Deep State. Forbes will also share Flight MH370 theories, and new information regarding US satellites that may have captured where the plane went down. In the second half, attorney and legal expert Robert K. Tanenbaum will discuss the assassination of JFK, and present alternate theories backed up by witness testimony, scientific audio, and evidence.
shows.second_half: From 6-10pm PT, Art Bell: Somewhere in Time returns to 2/8/01 when Dr. Gary Schwartz discussed how consciousness survives death.

shows.title: JFK Jr. Death Conspiracy / The Omega Car
shows.first_half: First Half: Researcher Donald Jeffries joins guest host Richard Syrett to discuss the July 1999 death of John F. Kennedy, Jr. He contends, as detailed in his book “American Memory Hole,” that JFK, Jr. was assassinated, right as he was about to enter politics. Jeffries will delve into the impossibilities of the official accidental death theory.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Automotive YouTube personality Casey Putsch, a rebel in the world of engineering and design, will be discussing his 104.7 MPG hyper-efficient diesel Omega sports car that out-accelerates a Dodge Viper and has a lower carbon footprint than an EV, per mile.

shows.title: The Art of Validation / Understanding Past Lives
shows.first_half: First Half: Psychologist and clinical instructor Caroline Fleck will discuss how the key to influence is not trying harder to be heard but mastering the art of making others feel understood and validated. She'll show us her psychological techniques from therapy rooms and how to incorporate them into our everyday interactions.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Creative writer and researcher Michael Goddart will speak about how we can understand our past lives, and what we can do to upgrade our next life and discover the true self in order to achieve ongoing contentment.

shows.title: Health & Endocannabinoid System / ETs & Orbs
shows.first_half: First Half: Researcher and educator Chip Paul will bring us his research on the immune system, how disease works, and human function under the endocannabinoid system. He'll also discuss the importance of omega-3 and omega-6 balance.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and experiencer Chris Bledsoe will recount his initial ET encounter, as well as near-death experiences and missing time. He'll also touch on subjects such as NASA’s interest in orb phenomena, and the role of other government agencies studying these anomalies.

shows.title: Ancient Egyptian History / Exploring Time Travel
shows.first_half: First Half: Kara Cooney is a professor of ancient Egyptian art and architecture and Chair of the Department of Near Eastern Languages and Cultures at the University of California, Los Angeles. She'll delve into Egyptian history, including her research on coffin reuse, royal power, and female power in the ancient dynastic world.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Ufologist and retired Army Lieutenant Colonel Kevin Randle will discuss time travel in both the real world and in fiction. He'll bring us compelling research into just how and if time can be manipulated.

shows.title: Geoengineering & Weather Modification / Entity Interferences
shows.first_half: First Half: Documentary filmmaker and activist Matt Landman will discuss 5G, geoengineering & chemtrail awareness, and weather modification. He'll present information derived directly from official documentation and accepted research.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author Maria Martinez believes ancient forces, Reptilians, the Anunnaki, and others have interfered with humanity’s original design. She'll reveal how these distortions, implants, and entity interferences are cleared across timelines and dimensions, and how dormant star seed codes can restore the divine template and help humanity reclaim its mission and identity.

shows.title: Underground Cities / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Researcher of secret underground and underwater bases and tunnels, Richard Sauder, joins guest host Rich Berra (email) for a discussion of secret hidden bunkers and cities for the uber wealthy and elite that are all over the world. He’ll report on recent revelations made by a former George H.W. Bush administration official who confirmed more than $21 trillion was spent to build underground tunnels in the event of an "extinction event." Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
